description: The Pokémon Company International has released Scarlet & Violet—Paldean Fates, the latest expansion for the Pokémon Trading Card Game. This new addition is now available at participating retailers worldwide, including the online Pokémon Center. Revival of Shiny Pokémon in the Latest Expansion Scarlet & Violet—Paldean Fates, inspired by popular expansions such as Hidden Fates and …
title: Pokémon Trading Card Game Launches Scarlet & Violet—Paldean Fates Expansion
